Sentencas: The present paper pinpoints the feasibility of in operando near-ambient pressure characterization of an operating single chamber solid oxide fuel cell (SC-SOFC) by means of spatially resolved X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy.
Titulo: Spatially Resolved Photoemission and Electrochemical Characterization of a Single-Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The results are based on an innovative and unique setup expanding the capabilities of the scanning photoelectron microscopes.
Titulo: Spatially Resolved Photoemission and Electrochemical Characterization of a Single-Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: In particular, the impact of getting access to the low mbar range on the very observability of chemical-state changes in an LSM cathode have been highlighted.
Titulo: Spatially Resolved Photoemission and Electrochemical Characterization of a Single-Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Ex situ and in situ electrochemical measurements at OCP and close circuit cell conditions complemented the photoemission mapping and spectroscopy.
Titulo: Spatially Resolved Photoemission and Electrochemical Characterization of a Single-Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The latter has evidenced the evolution of the chemical state of Sr upon the exposure of the typical SC-SOFC CH4-O-2 gas feed.
Titulo: Spatially Resolved Photoemission and Electrochemical Characterization of a Single-Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
